thread.title: Alia Bhatt: Anushka like a dream in debut film
thread.title_full: Alia Bhatt: Anushka like a dream in debut film - Entertainment

author: IANS
title: Alia Bhatt: Anushka like a dream in debut film
text:
'Highway' star Alia Bhatt, who earlier launched the trailer of her childhood friend Anushka Ranjan's debut film 'Wedding Pulav', says the budding actress is like a dream in the forthcoming romantic comedy.

Alia Bhatt and Anushka Ranjan 
"#WeddingPullav releases tomorrow (Friday). My sister from another mister @anushka0110 is like a dream in the film!!! Can't believe it's her first film," Alia posted on Twitter on Thursday.
"Go watch this fun, sweet and cute family pullav lots of love you guys @anushka0110 @anuranjan1010 @diganthmanchale @301055Ranjan," she added.
Directed by Binod Pradhan, the film also stars Diganth Manchale, Karan Grover and Rishi Kapoor.
